ComicInfo.Summary:
Matt Kindt! Wilfredo Torres!
Dr. Queen, scientist extraordinaire, is on the cutting edge of technology, industry, and--with the help of her telepathically controlled super car--terrorist butt kicking.
But when things go south in her attempt to take down a hacking supervillains diabolical plans, Queen finds that the lines between truth and fiction are blurred, and shes drafted into a war to save reality itself.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Wilfredo Torres & Nayoung Kim | 1 | | B | Variant Cover | Matt Kindt | 2 |
